cn.crowdos.kernel.Incentive

类 CredibilityBasedIncentiveImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.crowdos.kernel.Incentive.CredibilityBasedIncentiveImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CredibilityBasedIncentive, Resource<CredibilityBasedIncentive>

    public class CredibilityBasedIncentiveImpl
extends Object
implements CredibilityBasedIncentive
    CredibilityBasedIncentiveImpl is a concrete implementation of a credibility-based incentive. It implements the CredibilityBasedIncentive interface.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0.3
    作者:
    yuzy
